configuration.title: AZ AL Dev Tools/AL Code Outline

alOutline.autoGenerateFiles.description: Automatically generate files for newly created objects.

alOutline.autoGenerateFileDirectory.description: The default directory to create files in, relative to the root directory (e.g., "Source\<ObjectType>").

alOutline.autoShowFiles.description: Automatically show any newly created files in the editor.

alOutline.addDataItemToReportColumnName.description: Include data item name in the name of the report column

alOutline.defaultAppArea.description: Default application area for page code generator and code cleanup commands

alOutline.appAreaMode.description: Application area creation mode. They can be added to all controls or default value can be inherited from main object. This settings works for BC21 or newer

searchRegExp.description: Regular expression defining source text that should be replaced

alOutline.apiFieldNamesConversion.description: List of api field names replacements

alOutline.defaultApiPublisher.description: Default Api Publisher value for the page wizard

alOutline.defaultApiGroup.description: Default Api Group value for the page wizard

alOutline.defaultApiVersion.description: Default Api Version value for the page wizard

alOutline.defaultDataClassification.description: Default data classification for code cleanup commands

alOutline.defaultAddPageFieldCaptionsSet.description: Default settings for the AddPageFieldCaption command when run by the Code Cleanup

alOutline.defaultRemoveEmptyTriggersSett.description: Default settings for the RemoveEmptyTriggers command when run by the Code Cleanup

ignoreComments.description: Removes trigger or subscriber even if method body contains comments

alOutline.defaultRemoveEmptySectionsSett.description: Default settings for the RemoveEmptySections command when run by the Code Cleanup

removeActions.description: Remove empty actions (no properties and no code)

ignoreComments.description: Removes sections even if it contains comments inside

alOutline.defaultRemoveUnusedVariablesSe.description: Default settings for the RemoveUnusedVariables command when run by the Code Cleanup

alOutline.defaultListUsageCategory.description: Default usage category for list pages

alOutline.promptForObjectId.description: When generating a new object, ask the user to input the object ID.

alOutline.promptForObjectName.description: When generating a new object, ask the user to input the object name.

alOutline.promptForFilePath.description: When generating a new file, ask the user to specify a path relative to the root of the project-folder.

alOutline.stripNonAlphanumericCharacters.description: Always strip non-alphanumeric characters from generated object names.

alOutline.webClientPort.description: Web Client port. Enter 0 to use default http/https port number.

alOutline.openDefinitionInNewTab.description: Always open objects definitions in a new tab.

alOutline.noEmptyLinesAtTheEndOfWizardGe.description: Don't create empty lines at the end of files created by wizards.

alOutline.enableCodeCopFixes.description: Enable code actions fixing CodeCop warnings (AA0008 - missing parentheses, AA0137 - unused variable, AA0139 - possible text overflow)

alOutline.fixCodeCopMissingParenthesesOn.description: Fix Code Cop 'Missing Parentheses' warning on save when 'editor.codeActionsOnSave' setting contains 'source.fixAll' value

alOutline.codeActionsOnSave.description: Specifies which code-actions should be applied when a file is saved. Valid values are SortTableFields, SortReportColumns, SortProcedures, SortProperties, SortVariables, SortPermissions, SortPermissionSetList, SortCustomizations and FormatDocument

alOutline.codeCleanupActions.description: List of commands run by the Code Cleanup

alOutline.codeActionsOnSaveIgnoreFiles.description: Specifies which files should be ignored by code actions run when document is saved

alOutline.codeTransformationIgnoreFiles.description: Specifies which files should be ignored by code transformation commands when run for project or uncommited files

alOutline.pageActionToolTip.description: The default tooltip template for page actions. Use %1 as placeholder for action caption or name.

alOutline.pageFieldToolTip.default: Specifies the value of the %1 field.
alOutline.pageFieldToolTip.description: The default tooltip template for page fields. Use %1 or %Caption% as placeholder for field caption or name, %Caption.Comment% as placeholder for field caption comment

alOutline.pageFieldToolTipComment.description: The default tooltip comment template for page fields. Use %Caption% as placeholder for field caption or name, %Caption.Comment% as placeholder for field caption comment

alOutline.useTableFieldDescriptionAsTool.description: Use table field description as page field tooltip

alOutline.createApiFieldsCaptions.description: Set to true to create captions for API pages fields.

alOutline.useTableFieldCaptionsInApiFiel.description: Set to true to use table field captions in API pages fields. Set to false, to use camelCase api field names in api field captions

alOutline.lockRemovedFieldsCaptions.description: Set to true to lock captions of removed fields when 'Add Table Field Captions' command is run

alOutline.doNotReuseToolTipsFromOtherPag.description: Set to true to disable reusing field tooltips from other pages in the page wizard, 'add multiple fields' page code action and 'add missing tooltips' command

alOutline.reuseToolTipsFromDependencies.description: Reuse tooltips only defined in these dependencies. If empty, all dependencies will be used. Each entry should be defined as <dependency publisher> + <space> + '-' + <space> + <dependency name>

alOutline.additionalMandatoryAffixesPatt.description: Additional list of name affixes patterns, '?' can be used for matching any character. These values are used to remove affixes from names in code actions, commands and code completion

alOutline.fixCaseRemovesQuotesFromDataTy.description: Set to true to remove quotes around identifiers having names of al data types when running 'Fix Identifiers and Keywords Case' commands

alOutline.fixCaseRemovesQuotesFromNonDat.description: Set to true to remove quotes around identifiers having names that are not al data types when running 'Fix Identifiers and Keywords Case' commands

alOutline.useBCLinterCopCaseRules.description: Set to true to use case BCLinterCop case rules instead of Microsoft ones in 'Fix Identifiers and Keywords Case' commands

enumDescriptions: Full type name, keep variable name order
Main type name only, keep variable name order
alOutline.variablesSortMode.description: Specifies how variables are sorted by `Sort Variables` commands.

alOutline.triggersSortMode.description: Specifies how triggers are sorted by `Sort Procedures` commands.

parent.description: Type of syntax node containing triggers

order.description: List of trigger names in desired order

alOutline.triggersNaturalOrder.description: Specifies natural order of triggers for `Sort Procedures` commands.

alOutline.sortSingleNodeRegions.description: Set to true to sort regions containing single element (e.g. regions with single procedures by `Sort Procedures` command).

alOutline.dropDownGroupFieldsNamesPatter.description: Field names patterns for fields in table DropDown field group created by 'Add DropDown Field Groups' commands

alOutline.tableDataCaptionFieldsNamesPat.description: Field names patterns for fields in table DataCaptionFields property created by 'Add Table DataCaptionFields' commands

alOutline.keepVariableNamesCompletionAff.description: Set to true to keep affixes in variable names suggested by completion providers

alOutline.removeProceduresSemicolonInclu.description: Set to true to remove procedures semicolon also from interfaces

enumDescriptions: Data types based on variable names

alOutline.completionProviders.description: Specifies which completion providers should be active. If both VariableNamesWithType and VariableNames are selected, VariableNamesWithType will be used

alOutline.idReservationProvider.description: Object ID reservation provider used by object wizards
enumDescriptions: Next available ID in local files

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
